name: DIMENSIONLESS
description:
------------------------------------------------------

You control a small cube that will have to get out of this dimensionless universe using the various abilities available. You will have to use the color changers between black and white or white and black to cross the corresponding surfaces and reach the exit.
------------------------------------------------------

Created by a single developer, DIMENSIONLESS is a unique 2d platform game. Suitable for speed runners. Difficult and demanding, the challenge will be in order.

[Progress]
- Improve your character (health, damage, triple jump etc...) by defeating your enemies and collecting various things scattered around the world.

[Contents]
- Confront enemies and the recalcitrant boss who gains abilities as the clashes progress.
- Browse the areas of the world and search it from top to bottom.
- several in-game events will take you even further out of your comfort zone (rising danger zone, indestructible enemy chasing you, etc.).
- Play the classic mode of the game or add 1, 2 or even 3 combinable modes.

[Gameplay]
- Swap between black or white surfaces thanks to the color changer.
- Move, shoot, jump, bounce off the walls.
- Dynamic camera.
- Lots of different traps to dodge, where you sometimes have to find the right timing to cross them and understand how they work.
